industry: Personal Care Product Manufacturing, Retail Groceries, and Food and Beverage Manufacturing
description: The responsibilities of the QA Supervisor are to partner with the management to ensure food safety processes and best practices are implemented and maintained, anticipate and respond to any regulatory agency requirements and reports related to food safety, work directly with the management team to maintain, modify and improve the Quality System, oversee third-party audits, and be responsible for developing Hazard Analyses, HACCP plans, Preventive Controls and compliance with HACCP FSMA and all regulatory requirements. A successful candidate must have 4+ years of experience in a QA supervisory role, 5+ years of USDA food manufacturing experience, and experience managing in a food manufacturing environment.
